projects.name: Stone,Paper,Scissors Game
projects.description: This is a simple game created using HTML, CSS, JavaScript .In this we have to select any one option from Stone, Paper, Scissors and the random move will taken from the project side . After that it will provide a pop message that win or losse the game.

projects.name: Dashboard (using Tableau)
projects.description: In this project I have created many charts like created donut chart, created horizontal bar chart, created average salary bar chart, created average salary map, created average salaray by job title experience. with the help of these chart and dashboard we can easily find data science employes by job salaries depending on the experience level employement type country and job title.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Page

projects.name: Interactive Image Gallery
